definition: human nature/humanity/human/the totality of human attributes
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be devoid of all humanity/inhuman/bestial

sentences.english: Having been dehumanized in turn, they will embrace inhumanity and brutality.
sentences.chinese: 既已被非人化，他們將擁抱非人性和殘暴。

sentences.english: When he says "take care" the words are inflected with humanity.
sentences.chinese: 當他說‘一路小心’，言語間充滿了人性。

sentences.english: Errors indeed in this virtue of goodness, or charity, may be committed.
sentences.chinese: 但人性中這種仁善的傾向，有時也會犯錯誤。

sentences.english: Knowledge without conscience is the ruination of the soul.
sentences.chinese: 沒有道德依託的知識，是對人性的毀滅。

sentences.english: Hello, and welcome to the Inner Core.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，歡迎收看《人性》節目。

sentences.english: they don't pay fair wages, their hours are inhumane,
sentences.chinese: 工資不合理，工作時間太沒人性了。

sentences.english: These, then, are the parts common to the male and the female sex .
sentences.chinese: 然後，這些就是通常關於男人和女人性的部分。

sentences.english: He may retain his human dignity even in a concentration camp.
sentences.chinese: 即使是置身於集中營，他仍可以保有他的人性尊嚴。

sentences.english: Tailer-Made Services to meet the Requirements and Expectations of the Customer.
sentences.chinese: 人性化貼心服務，超乎客戶的需求和期望。

sentences.english: They are a test of your humanity.
sentences.chinese: 他們是對你人性的一種考驗。
它使一個戀童癖人性化。

sentences.english: Linear door handle and auto-return to open, humanistic design.
sentences.chinese: 直線式門拉手和開門自動迴歸，設計更具人性化。

sentences.english: The question complex of Dostoevsky's creation is for the testing of the precondition of humanity which takes freedom, guiltiness , belief as its basic ideas.
sentences.chinese: 陀思妥耶夫斯基創作的問題意識是對人性前提的論證。

sentences.english: The irony of humanism is that it dehumanizes .
sentences.chinese: 諷刺的是，它的人文主義人性。

sentences.english: And thank you for joining us here in the Inner Core.
But if you\'re like me, my humanity is more like a window.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你們像我一樣，我的人性更像一扇窗。

definition: innate sense of right and wrong/conscience/bosom friend
popular feeling/the will of the people
